ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.1[/h1] [h1][i]Caution: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] users should consider using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2836791007]RimFantasy - Medieval Overhaul Edition[/url] instead of this mod.[/i][/h1]
This mod adds 4 new magical gem furnitures that radiate temperature changing energy.
Moderately powerful but costly, they are capable of supporting anywhere from a small storage room to a large facility when multiple are installed. Be careful though, the energies within the crystals are barely contained and excessive damage will produce a rather spectacular explosion.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]2 Crystal Bowls (Cold/Hot) [*]2 Pylons (Frost/Flame) [*]1 Research [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630669656]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2632845986]RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2634323159]RimFantasy - Arcane Batons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2656314145]RimFantasy - Arcane Defences[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2651522590]RimFantasy - Arcane Weapons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Save Game Compatible [*]Will not play nice with other gemstone mods without a patch. [/list]
